page.title: 20OUR DOMESDAY PROJECT
page.content:
{The children who worked on the project Farren Broomfield Debbie Burse Lisa Costema Tamsin Cross Michael Harris Jonathan Brackley Lucy Hopkins Jane Cornish Anthony Townsend Mathew Smith Christopher Markham Peter Gilbert Tina Foster Caroline Holman Stephen Prescott Julie Hutter Heather Maunder Jamie Cross Sarah Borlace Shona Price Hayley Broomfield Stephen Batten William Borlace
The 20 screen pages were produced by Caroline,Christopher,Debbie,Farren, Heather,Julie,Lisa,Michael,Peter, Sarah and Stephen. The Surveys were keyed in by Debbie and Lisa. The photographs were taken by Mr.P.Curtis {July,1985
